item.title: Bài 001 : Cài đặt ruby
item.description: Hướng dẫn cài đặt ruby trên ubuntu(16.04) Chi tiết các bước thực hiện Cài đặt các gói ruby dependencies Cài đặt rbenv Cài đặt ruby Kiểm tra version Cài đặt gem bundler để quản lí packages Cài đặt các gói ruby dependencies sudo apt-get install -y libssl-dev libreadline-dev zlib1g-dev sudo apt-get install build-essential Cài đặt rbenv Link tham khảo : https://github.com/rbenv/rbenv cd ~ git clone https://github.

item.title: Facebook Access Token
item.description: 1.Access Tokens Generating User Access Tokens There are two kinds of user access tokens: Short Term User Token Generation System User Token Generation 1.1. Short Term User Token Generation

item.title: 1st stack: Ruby On Rails
item.description: Tổng quan về 1st stack 1. Backbone : ruby on rails ( ror ) Ruby version : >= 2.5.1 Rails version : >= 5.2.0 2. 3. Relational Databases PostgreSQL MYSQL 4. NoSQL Redis Memcached 5.Caching Caching stragies : https://devcenter.heroku.com/articles/caching-strategies Caching with rails : http://guides.rubyonrails.org/caching_with_rails.html Cài đặt ruby Hướng dẫn cài đặt ruby trên ubuntu(16.04)

item.title: Hugo Tips
item.description: Command Description hugo server run dev server in local hugo build hugo new page-name.md new page hugo new blog/post-name.md new blog post hugo new note/projectname-day001.md new project note hugo new article/subject-001-installation.md new subject's article Links https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/sort-order-only-bydate-or-byweight/6961/4 https://discourse.gohugo.io/t/question-regarding-next-prev-navigation/1055/3
